cast.name: 斯科特·巴库拉 Scott Bakula

introduction: Hell of a View is a love story. Of people falling in love with each other, and of being in love with a dream, and harnessing that passion to make that dream a reality. After the destruction of his family's well established Atlantic City restaurant in Hurricane Sandy, Sam Rama must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. When Sam comes to the aid of a wealthy patron, Tom Blake, and falls for the newly separated Sarah Bell, a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others, and realize that the greatest investments take more than cash.
